full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CEA 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GI 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MA'I BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL BZLOG BSGYUR YIG SNYING MA RNYING PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS NYER GCIG 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO'I DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA MCHOG PAR, RANG RANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN @005B GYI BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNGS RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
